rules_text:
Search your library and/or outside the game for a cryptid card you own, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle. [i](Aliens, Eldrazi, Horrors, and Mutants are cryptids.)[/i]
{G}{G}, Exile Close Encounter from your graveyard: Add two mana of any one type. [i](Mana of any color, or {C}.)[/i]
